definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.english: Only primary partitions can be swap partitions.
sentences.chinese: 只有主分區可以是對換分區。

sentences.english: In the meantime, the direction of emigration has even reversed itself.
sentences.chinese: 同時期，人口遷移的方向對換了。

sentences.english: It is proved in this paper that the transposition network and the multiplicative circulant networks are superconnected.
sentences.chinese: 本文證明了對換網絡和乘積循環網絡是超連通的。

sentences.english: Here, we once again translate the contrapositive of the Any criteria.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我們再次翻譯的任何標準，對換。

sentences.english: They can be bought, sold, borrowed, lent, swapped and hedged.
sentences.chinese: 可以買賣，出售，拆借，租賃，對換，套期。

sentences.english: He often trade stamps with others.
sentences.chinese: 他經常與別人對換郵票。

sentences.english: He trades shares of stock on the New York Stock Exchange.
sentences.chinese: 他在紐約證券交易所對換股票。
